attributes.action: Allow a part of land to the car community in the westmidlands/blackcountry.
attributes.additional_details: So for years the council and police have been trying to control "car cruising" within the west Midlands/ Black Country which results in people not being able to do something that they consider a hobby you call it a crime but that's only about 10percent of the car community if not less there are a lot of us who would like somewhere local that we could go to enjoy each others builds and meet like minded people. People complain about us so called boy racers being on the streets so get us off the streets by atleast negotiating you give us we will give back we are a respectable community if you give us a chance.
attributes.background:
Give the car community somewhere local to go! 
Get us off the streets but atleast give us somewhere that we can go and enjoy the company and builds of other enthusiasts that we don't have to pay for cause or travel out of our area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
